sources.title: Flirting With Danger
sources.description: In 1934 mixing dynamite was a bit like making a stew, every cook did it a little different. Three wild and crazy guys have no fear as they mix dynamite and the girls in dangerous combinations.

metadata.Plot: Rafe Marino begins to turn up evidence that leads him to suspect that there was more to his best friend's death than meets the eye. But getting to the truth proves difficult and dangerous when he becomes entangled with a mysterious femme fatale.
metadata.Actors: Charisma Carpenter, James Thomas, Victoria Sanchez
